name: Total Kilometers from Actual Missions
query:
select ma.employee as 'Employee:Link/Employee:100', ma.employee_name as 'Name::300', sum(md.km_car_to-md.km_car_from) as 'Total Kilometers::200'
from `tabMission Details Actual` md 
left join `tabMission Actual` ma on ma.name=md.parent
where md.docstatus<>2 and md.holiday=0 and md.date>=%(from_date)s and md.date<=%(to_date)s
and company=%(company)s and business_unit=%(business_unit)s
group by employee
